Week of December 1, 2014 <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-webinar-series> EVOLVING DEVOPS: THE BENEFITS OF PAAS AND APPLICATION DIAL TONE Join us <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/evolving-devops-the-benefits-of-paas-and-application-dial-tone> December 10th, 10AM PST for, "Evolving DevOps: The Benefits of PaaS and Application Dial Tone", the latest installment in our Cloud Platform Webinar Series.
Learn the symbiotic relationship between DevOps and PaaS, how to transform your infrastructure into an abstracted application layer that stands ready to initiate services on demand, and the kinds of outcomes experienced by early adopters of the Pivotal CF PaaS. REGISTER <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/evolving-devops-the-benefits-of-paas-and-application-dial-tone> EPISODE #9: USING PIVOTAL CF FOR BLUE/GREEN DEPLOYMENT, WEDNESDAY, DECEMBER 3RD <http://pivotal.io/podcasts> Join us <http://www.pivotal.io/podcasts> this week for 'Using Pivotal CF for Blue/Green Deployment', Episode #9 of our ongoing podcast series.
Getting new features into the hands of your customers sounds great, but it can be a little trickier than it looks. How do you ensure that a change does not “break” the system? How do you roll-back if something bad happens? How do you deploy a change so that no traffic is lost, packets are dropped or transactions missed?
Fortunately Pivotal CF provides built-in capability to handle this complexity for you. In this episode, we will dive more deeply into the concept of Blue/Green deployments, and the mechanism used by Pivotal CF to deploy changes into production with zero downtime and no packets dropped! SUBSCRIBE <http://www.pivotal.io/podcasts> TWITTER NLP EXAMPLE: HOW TO SCALE PART-OF-SPEECH TAGGING WITH MPP (PART 1) <http://blog.pivotal.io/data-science-pivotal/products/twitter-nlp-example-how-to-scale-part-of-speech-tagging-with-mpp-part-1> In this two-part series, open source code is shared as one of Pivotal’s Senior Data Scientists provides an overview of part-of-speech tagging on tweets, explains the purpose and value, dives into the challenges with social language processing, and shows how to use open source Java tools on PostgreSQL as well as Pivotal’s massively parallel processing data platforms to increase scale.
